post_task_answers.q2: The overall aim seemed achievable, but the repetitive questioning felt like there wasn't an aim in mind, but more of a bot asking very similar questions each time. I also kept getting error messages, which meant i had to submit each reply two or three times before it worked.

messages.content: I'm looking for a running show which is breathable and light, but with a good amount of cushioning and support
Thanks for sharing all those great preferences! To help you best, could you please tell me which one or two features matter most to you?
cushioning
